verses.verse: Then <S%H1732>David<s%> <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H2088>This<s%> is the <S%H1004>house<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H430>God,<s%> and <S%H2088>this<s%> is the <S%H4196>altar<s%> of the burnt <S%H5930>offering<s%> for <S%H3478>Israel.<s%>

And <S%H1732>David<s%> <S%H559>commanded<s%> to gather <S%H3664>together<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H1616>strangers<s%> <S%H834>that<s%> were in the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel;<s%> and he <S%H5975>set<s%> <S%H2672>masons<s%> to <S%H2672>hew<s%> <S%H1496>wrought<s%> <S%H68>stones<s%> to <S%H1129>build<s%> the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H430>God.<s%>

And <S%H1732>David<s%> <S%H3559>prepared<s%> <S%H1270>iron<s%> in <S%H7230>abundance<s%> for the <S%H4548>nails<s%> for the <S%H1817>doors<s%> of the <S%H8179>gates,<s%> and for the <S%H4226>joinings;<s%> and <S%H5178>brass<s%> in <S%H7230>abundance<s%> <S%H369>without<s%> <S%H4948>weight;<s%>

Also <S%H730>cedar<s%> <S%H6086>trees<s%> in <S%H369>abundance:<s%> <S%H4557><s%> <S%H3588>for<s%> the <S%H6722>Zidonians<s%> and they of <S%H6876>Tyre<s%> <S%H935>brought<s%> <S%H7230>much<s%> <S%H730>cedar<s%> <S%H6086>wood<s%> to <S%H1732>David.<s%>

And <S%H1732>David<s%> <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H8010>Solomon<s%> my <S%H1121>son<s%> is <S%H5288>young<s%> and <S%H7390>tender,<s%> and the <S%H1004>house<s%> that is to be <S%H1129>built<s%> for the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> must be <S%H4605>exceeding<s%> <S%H1431>magnifical,<s%> of <S%H8034>fame<s%> and of <S%H8597>glory<s%> throughout <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H776>countries:<s%> I will therefore <S%H4994>now<s%> make <S%H3559>preparation<s%> for it. So <S%H1732>David<s%> <S%H3559>prepared<s%> <S%H7230>abundantly<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> his <S%H4194>death.<s%>

Then he <S%H7121>called<s%> for <S%H8010>Solomon<s%> his <S%H1121>son,<s%> and <S%H6680>charged<s%> him to <S%H1129>build<s%> a <S%H1004>house<s%> for the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H430>God<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel.<s%>

And <S%H1732>David<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H8010>Solomon,<s%> My <S%H1121>son,<s%> as for <S%H589>me,<s%> it <S%H1961>was<s%> <S%H5973>in<s%> my <S%H3824>mind<s%> to <S%H1129>build<s%> a <S%H1004>house<s%> unto the <S%H8034>name<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> my God: <S%H430><s%>

But the <S%H1697>word<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H1961>came<s%> <S%H5921>to<s%> me, <S%H559>saying,<s%> Thou hast <S%H8210>shed<s%> <S%H1818>blood<s%> <S%H7230>abundantly,<s%> and hast <S%H6213>made<s%> <S%H1419>great<s%> <S%H4421>wars:<s%> thou shalt <S%H3808>not<s%> <S%H1129>build<s%> a <S%H1004>house<s%> unto my <S%H8034>name,<s%> <S%H3588>because<s%> thou hast <S%H8210>shed<s%> <S%H7227>much<s%> <S%H1818>blood<s%> upon the <S%H776>earth<s%> in my <S%H6440>sight.<s%>

Behold, <S%H2009><s%> a <S%H1121>son<s%> shall be <S%H3205>born<s%> to thee, <S%H1931>who<s%> shall <S%H1961>be<s%> a <S%H376>man<s%> of <S%H4496>rest;<s%> and I will give him <S%H5117>rest<s%> from <S%H4480>all<s%> <S%H3605><s%> his <S%H341>enemies<s%> round <S%H4480>about:<s%> <S%H5439><s%> <S%H3588>for<s%> his <S%H8034>name<s%> shall <S%H1961>be<s%> <S%H8010>Solomon,<s%> and I will <S%H5414>give<s%> <S%H7965>peace<s%> and <S%H8253>quietness<s%> <S%H5921>unto<s%> <S%H3478>Israel<s%> in his <S%H3117>days.<s%>

He <S%H1931><s%> shall <S%H1129>build<s%> a <S%H1004>house<s%> for my <S%H8034>name;<s%> and <S%H1931>he<s%> shall <S%H1961>be<s%> my <S%H1121>son,<s%> and <S%H589>I<s%> will be his <S%H1>father;<s%> and I will <S%H3559>establish<s%> the <S%H3678>throne<s%> of his <S%H4438>kingdom<s%> <S%H5921>over<s%> <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H5704>forever.<s%> <S%H5769><s%>

Now, <S%H6258><s%> my <S%H1121>son,<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H1961>be<s%> <S%H5973>with<s%> thee; and <S%H6743>prosper<s%> thou, and <S%H1129>build<s%> the <S%H1004>house<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> thy <S%H430>God,<s%> <S%H834>as<s%> he hath <S%H1696>said<s%> <S%H5921>of<s%> thee.

Only <S%H389><s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H5414>give<s%> thee <S%H7922>wisdom<s%> and <S%H998>understanding,<s%> and give thee <S%H6680>charge<s%> <S%H5921>concerning<s%> <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> that thou mayest <S%H8104>keep<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H8451>law<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> thy <S%H430>God.<s%>

Then <S%H227><s%> shalt thou <S%H6743>prosper,<s%> <S%H518>if<s%> thou takest <S%H8104>heed<s%> to <S%H6213>fulfill<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H2706>statutes<s%> and <S%H4941>judgments<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H6680>charged<s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H4872>Moses<s%> with <S%H5921>concerning<s%> <S%H3478>Israel:<s%> be <S%H2388>strong,<s%> and of good <S%H553>courage;<s%> <S%H3372>dread<s%> <S%H408>not,<s%> <S%H408>nor<s%> be <S%H2865>dismayed.<s%>

Now, <S%H2009>behold,<s%> in my <S%H6040>trouble<s%> I have <S%H3559>prepared<s%> for the <S%H1004>house<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> a <S%H3967>hundred<s%> <S%H505>thousand<s%> <S%H3603>talents<s%> of <S%H2091>gold,<s%> and a <S%H505>thousand<s%> <S%H505>thousand<s%> <S%H3603>talents<s%> of <S%H3701>silver;<s%> and of <S%H5178>brass<s%> and <S%H1270>iron<s%> <S%H369>without<s%> <S%H4948>weight;<s%> <S%H3588>for<s%> it <S%H1961>is<s%> in <S%H7230>abundance:<s%> <S%H6086>timber<s%> also and <S%H68>stone<s%> have I <S%H3559>prepared;<s%> and thou mayest <S%H3254>add<s%> <S%H5921>thereto.<s%>

Moreover there are <S%H6213>workmen<s%> <S%H4399><s%> <S%H5973>with<s%> thee in <S%H7230>abundance,<s%> <S%H2672>hewers<s%> and <S%H2796>workers<s%> of <S%H68>stone<s%> and <S%H6086>timber,<s%> and all <S%H3605>manner<s%> of cunning <S%H2450>men<s%> for every <S%H3605>manner<s%> of <S%H4399>work.<s%>

Of the <S%H2091>gold,<s%> the <S%H3701>silver,<s%> and the <S%H5178>brass,<s%> and the <S%H1270>iron,<s%> there is <S%H369>no<s%> <S%H4557>number.<s%> <S%H6965>Arise<s%> therefore, and be <S%H6213>doing,<s%> and the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H1961>be<s%> <S%H5973>with<s%> thee.
David <S%H1732><s%> also <S%H6680>commanded<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H8269>princes<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> to <S%H5826>help<s%> <S%H8010>Solomon<s%> his <S%H1121>son,<s%> saying,

Is <S%H3808>not<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> your <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H5973>with<s%> you? and hath he not given you <S%H5117>rest<s%> on every <S%H4480>side?<s%> <S%H5439><s%> <S%H3588>for<s%> he hath <S%H5414>given<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H3427>inhabitants<s%> of the <S%H776>land<s%> into mine <S%H3027>hand;<s%> and the <S%H776>land<s%> is <S%H3533>subdued<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> and <S%H6440>before<s%> his <S%H5971>people.<s%>

Now <S%H6258><s%> <S%H5414>set<s%> your <S%H3824>heart<s%> and your <S%H5315>soul<s%> to <S%H1875>seek<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> your <S%H430>God;<s%> <S%H6965>arise<s%> therefore, and <S%H1129>build<s%> <S%H853>ye<s%> the <S%H4720>sanctuary<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H430>God,<s%> to <S%H935>bring<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H727>ark<s%> of the <S%H1285>covenant<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> and the <S%H6944>holy<s%> <S%H3627>vessels<s%> of <S%H430>God,<s%> into the <S%H1004>house<s%> that is to be <S%H1129>built<s%> to the <S%H8034>name<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD.<s%>
